<title level="1" pfs="">[Nwanyian Defender](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2089)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Nwanyian Defender](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2089)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 38</row>

**Perception** +12

**Languages**
[Drooni](/Languages.aspx?ID=100)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Bravery** Whenever the defender rolls a success at a Will save against a [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effect, they get a critical success instead. In addition, any time they gain the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition, they reduce its value by 1.

**Items**
[Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (20 arrows), _+1 [guisarme](/Weapons.aspx?ID=25)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 80

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_guisarme_ +15 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d10+8 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite shortbow +11 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Offensive Line**   The defender's Strikes deal an extra 1d6 damage when adjacent to an ally.

</column>
name: Nwanyian Defender
